name: ack-ai
description: Flags @ai-gen tags in DocBlocks that haven't been marked as 'ok'.

ackAi.tag.description: The specific tag to search for in comments (e.g. '@ai-gen' or '@review').

ackAi.allowedStates.description: List of keywords that mark the code as reviewed (case-insensitive).

ackAi.rejectedStates.description: List of keywords that mark the code as rejected (case-insensitive).

ackAi.warningColor.description: Background color for code awaiting review (CSS color string).

ackAi.rejectedColor.description: Background color for rejected code (CSS color string).

ackAi.detectInlineComments.description: Whether to detect @ai-gen tags in inline comments (//).

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
